mapper.select: SELECT B.FED_STD_ITEM_ID AS fedStdItemId, B.FED_STD_ITEM_NAME AS fedStdItemName, A.FED_GOOD_VAL AS goodVal, A.FED_NORMAL_VAL AS normalVal, A.FED_BAD_VAL AS badVal FROM pd_fed_std AS A, pd_fed_std_item AS B WHERE A.FED_STD_ITEM_ID = B.FED_STD_ITEM_ID AND A.STANDARD_ID = #{filterMap.standardId}
SELECT A.STANDARD_ID AS standardId FROM pd_standard AS A WHERE A.CLASSESTREE_CODE = #{filterMap.classestreeCode}
